item.description:
This isn't a "hike" in the traditional sense. It is a free excursion to usderstand a little of another culture and faith that many of us do not have experience with.
------------
Join the MCC Muslim Student Association for The Taste of Ramadan, an evening of great spiritual conversation with guest speaker Ms. Marwa Aly. Food will be provided from various area restaurants. This event is free and open to the public.

Location: Lowe Building Lobby

For more information, contact: Professor Fatma Antar (860) 512-2788
-------------

For Hartford Area Hiking members, Kevin S is the organizer for our membership to the event.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: MCC food event: The Taste of Ramadan
